archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Identify Party Revenue Share Discrepancy
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Compare information received from another party with the revenue share determined by an enterprise to identify a discrepancy.

properties.value: Identify Party Revenue Share Discrepancy compares information received from another party with the revenue share determined by an enterprise. Differences are classified as a discrepancy that is to be resolved. For example, an enterprise's calculated revenue share for a product offering may be missing a product that has been acquired that appears on an bill/invoice from another party.
